duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as an advocate for managing a safe worksite and identifying stakeholder dependencies and construction deliverables.
Manage lease providers, support-associated teams, and deliver RFS “Ready for Service” for each lease site location.
Travel up to 100% of the time to data center sites and maintain lease agreement requirements using best practices.
Drive deployment of solutions socialized globally across DCD projects and facilitate decision-making to drive solutions and schedules.
Provide project single point of contact for project development and delivery, and attend scheduled owner/architect/contractor and other project meetings.
Report project progress, manage the construction process of achieving RFS, track lessons learned, and ensure lease provider’s compliance to lease agreement contract.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Project Management, Architecture, Engineering, or related field AND 5+ years experience in construction project management of Data Centers or Mission Critical Facilities or equivalent experience.
Degrees and/or professional licenses in Construction Management or Electrical/Mechanical Engineering or similar experience
